entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of thunderstorms in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 22. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening and risk of thunderstorms. Clearing in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
